TopicTitle: Couldn't switch to requested monitor resolution.

Articles.Content:
Output file: https://1drv.ms/t/s!AiOx2LWATSlvyjoWDbrrbcHh4HdT 

My game crashes on startup saying couldn't switch to requested monitor resolution. 

It also says: Switching to resolution 1280x0 failed, trying lower one
Switching to resolution 1280x0 failed, trying lower one
All resolution switches have failed
Screen: could not switch resolution (1280x720 fs=1 hz=0) 

I tried un-installing the game and re-installing, but that didn't work. Please help. 

Specs: 

AMD A10-7300 

Radeon R6-M255DX 

8GB RAM 

Steam version
Steam reinstall probably left previous config files intact, remove settings.cfg and try again. Also Unity have screen config of it's own, but I can't tell where to find it on windows.

6 minutes ago, radonek said:

Steam reinstall probably left previous config files intact, remove settings.cfg and try again. Also Unity have screen config of it's own, but I can't tell where to find it on windows.

That file isn't there, it must have been deleted before. I heard there is something to do with the registry that fixes it, people say to change it to 720p in the registry, but my screen is 768p, should I still change it to 720p?
Put there anything you like and disable fullscreen. Game is much less picky about screen  in windowed mode. Then you can pick one of autodetected resolutions in game settings.
